p: The experiment was conducted at the Université Paul Valéry Montpellier 3 (UPVM3) (France) during sessions organized in January 2020 and February 2020, respectively. 106 participants (63 women and 43 men) ranging in age from 18 to 29 years old ( M = 20.24, SD = 2.572) were recruited randomly from psychology classes, receiving course credits for their participation. The experiment was single-blind and lasted about 45 mins.
